title: Kenai Fjords National Park: Sled Dog Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Outfitters and Guides     Sled Dog Tours                Sled Dog Tours         Dog sledding is a great way to experience Exit Glacier in the winter months. NPS / Jim Pfeiffenberger  These companies are authorized to provide winter tours by traditional dog sled throughout the park.  Ididaride Sled Dog Tours, Inc. P.O. Box 2906 Seward AK 99664 phone: (907) 224-8607 fax: (907) 224-8608 email: ididaride@wildbear.net internet: www.ididaride.com
